game.name: No Roads: 4×4 Off-Road Challenge
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Take it slow or send it hard—No Roads lets you tackle terrain your way. Explore tough climbs, find creative lines, and use tools like a winch when you need a boost.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take it slow or send it hard—No Roads lets you tackle terrain your way. Explore tough climbs, find creative lines, and use tools like a winch when you need a boost.
